sections.text:
81-2270.Purchase of services with state funds; sliding-fee scale.

Services identified by care plans for those not eligible for services provided through the home and community-based waiver for the aged and disabled may be purchased with funds appropriated through section 81-2235 based on a sliding-fee scale.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 801, ยง 6;Laws 1996, LB 1044, ยง 892;Laws 2009, LB288, ยง 37.
